snippet: Nine people have been arrested and 27 others are being sought in a crackdown on citizens who have gone to fight in the Middle East or have recruited fighters.
lead_paragraph: Nine people have been arrested and 27 others are being sought in a crackdown on citizens who have gone to fight in the Middle East or have recruited fighters.

headline.main: Macedonia Arrests 9 Suspected of Having Ties to ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
